section.title: Community
section.para: Developers and users alike are welcome to engage the Jetty community. We all have day jobs here so don't just ask questions on IRC and frustrated if no one answers right away. Stick around to hear an answer, one is likely coming at some point!

section.title: Mailing Lists
section.para: We have a number of options for people that wish to subscribe to our mailing lists.

section.title: Internet Relay Chat - IRC
section.para: Much of our conversations about Jetty occur on IRC in one location or another. Users are always welcome to come join our IRC channels and talk with us, other users, or just lurk.

listitem.para: Our primary location, we recommend that if your looking to find folks on IRC you try here.
We also have commit notifications coming to this channel on the bottom and top of the hour.
Our prior location before the move to the eclipse foundation. We are idle on here.

section.title: Commit Tracking
section.para:
Since Jetty is composed of a diverse array of project source repositories, bridged between the eclipse foundation, the codehaus, and some simple projects on GitHub, we use a hidden gem of opensource called cia.vc to aggregate commits on our primary repositories to one location so its easier to follow what and where things are happening.
http://cia.vc/stats/project/jetty This page is updated at the bottom and the top of the hour. RSS feeds are also available through this service.
